title: ThreeDGarden.com on ThreeD.AI
description: 'threed-garden' demonstrates active development use of the 'threed-ai' platform. 'threed-ai' is a functioning, legit, low-dependency app, a package supporting a monorepo of workspaces that utilize/depend on 'ThreeJS, WebGL, React, TypeScript <Fiber>, GraphQL', in active development.
author: Marty McGee <mcgee.marty@gmail.com> (https://github.com/marty-mcgee)
